abstracts.cdata!:
Ukraine has met all but two conditions
            for release of the second tranche of the Second Programmatic
            Adjustment Loan (PAL-2). Ukraine has continued to improve
            the payment discipline in the electricity and gas sector
            through the satisfactory implementation of debt resolution,
            as evinced by: (i) the adoption by the Parliament (Verkhovna
            Rada) of a comprehensive law on debt resolution in the
            energy sector; and (ii) the obligatory participation of
            enterprises, in which the state has a controlling share, in
            the debt resolution mechanism established by the said law.
